alert.note: Alert for Harris (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 9:52AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harris County through 1015 AM EST... At 951 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Bartletts Ferry Dam, or 7 miles north of Smiths, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Pine Mountain, Goat Rock Lake, Mountain Hill, Cataula, Mulberry Grove and Lake Harding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
